publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5400 Hugh Henry: Renfrewshire Council Trading Standards—That the Parliament welcomes the initiative by Renfrewshire Council to recycle seized counterfeit clothing to homeless people; congratulates the trading standards service on its success in seizing these counterfeit goods; welcomes the help for disadvantaged people with goods seized from criminals, and further commends Renfrewshire Council’s initiative to other local authorities.
S3M-5400 Renfrewshire Council Trading Standards (lodged on 11 December 2009) Michael Matheson*
